page.title: 16A Typical Day-Monday
page.content: 8.00 Get up. Dress. Make bed. Take schoolbag. Walk downstairs. Say Good morning to Mum. Watch TV and eat piece of toast.Go to school with friends. 8.55 Whistle goes on playground. Go to our lines, then walk in. In classroom, Early Work awaits us-either based on the news or involves continuing with other work. 9.20 Assembly. Then Maths in sets. 10.30 Playtime until 10.45. Then Eng- lish sets. 12.15 Lunchtime. Play until dinner lady lines us up. Go to hall to eat. Play again until... 1.25 Religious Education. 2.30 Playtime until 2.45.Hymn practice in the hall. 3.30 Put chairs up. Line up. Go home. 5.30 Go to brownies. Back home, watch television then bed. Karen Mead, Oak Lodge.
